title: Joe Rogan gets the last laugh as Neil Young comes crawling back to Spotify: "Great to know you got some ethics‚Äù
description:
Of all the virtue signaling during the pandemic, falling somewhere in the Top 3 was Neil Young pulling all his music off of Spotify due to podcaster Joe Rogan's, quote, "misinformation." Outside of those of us who have a copy of After the Gold Rush on vinyl and weren't affected, reaction was a combination of "meh" and "what's a Neil Young?" Now Rogan is getting the last laugh as Young has returned to the streaming service, possibly with a new album entitled "Alone with my principles." #NameThatMovie

It's quaint to think about, as various flashback apps remind us that we are on the fourth anniversary of the start of quarantine.
